ygData.subject: Mornin all....
ygData.msgSnippet: Heya all, Geez man some people are just s testy i swear, how many evil sounding relplies did i get about that axe thing hmm let me count, 1, 2, 3,
ygData.messageBody:
Heya all,

Geez man some people are just s testy i swear, how many evil sounding
relplies did i get about that axe thing hmm let me count, 1, 2, 3,
4......notcie i said i THINK this is where its found and have HEARD some
things not that i knew it was there, oh and to mr andrew palmer it seems
that your idea of where the axe is was wrong aas well....way to go smart ass
=)

Hey Vash you out there this morning? If you are i was on from 10 till 2 last
night....logged on as Rayne not lothaniel, but i didnt see you anywhere!
Where were ya? Ill be on #Everquest from here on in on mIRC so come join me
all if you want.

Lothaniel T'Kazz
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> ----------
> From: Tom Swift[SMTP:tswift@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 5:00 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Having troubles...
>
> I am a bit lost as to where I should be hunting right now.
>
> I have reached level 15, I am almost 16. I have maxed both dual wield and
> double attack at 80 each. I seem to be having trouble effectively
> hunting. Anything that cons white to me is always a tough fight that can
> go either way, so I usually end up sticking to blue critters. However
> some blue critters are just to tough to solo. Lava basilisks are a no-no
> because of Stone Breath, fire elementals have some kind of damage shield
> which causes me damage each time I hit so they are a no-no also.
> Lavastorm being my preferred hunting area right now. I tried crocs in
> Oasis, but it is to crowded when I play (8pm-10pm) for me to even find
> anything to kill.
>
> I guess I am at that awkward level and was looking for advice from other
> warriors on how they got fro 15 to 16.
>
> Bael
> Warrior of the 15th Order
> Indigo Brotherhood of the Tier'dal
>
